paper_title.en: Mass formula for two-dimensional flavor non-singlet mesons.

paper_title.ja: A new basis function approach to 't~Hooft equation
paper_title.en: A New Basis Function Approach to 't Hooft Equation

description.en:
We present the new basis functions to investigate the 't Hooft equation, the
lowest order mesonic Light-Front Tamm-Dancoff equation for $\rm SU(N_C)$ gauge
theories. We find the wave function can be well approximated by new basis
functions and obtain an analytic formula for the mass of the lightest bound
state. Its value is consistent with the precedent results.

publication_name.ja: World Scientific Pub., "Quantum Chromodynamics"

paper_title.ja: A new basis function approach to 't Hooft-Bergknoff-Eller equations
paper_title.en: A new basis function approach to 't Hooft-Bergknoff-Eller equations

publication_name.ja: Physical Review

paper_title.en: Can a gravitational wave and a magnetic monopole coexist?

description.en: We investigate the behavior of small perturbations around the Kaluza-Klein monopole in the live-dimensional space-time. We find that the even parity gravitational wave does not propagate in the five-dimensional space-time with Kaluza-Klein monopole provided that the gravitational wave is constant in the fifth direction. We conclude that a gravitational wave and a U(1) magnetic monopole do not coexist in five-dimensional Kaluza-Klein space-time.

publisher.en: WORLD SCIENTIFIC PUBL CO PTE LTD

paper_title.en: Mesons in two-dimensional QCD on the light cone

description.en: Two-dimensional QCD is quantized on the light front coordinate. We solve the Einstein-Schrodinger equation by the use of Tamm-Dancoff truncation and find that the simplest wave function produces the Mig versus mig relation in agreement with other calculations, where M and m are the masses of the ground state and quarks, respectively.

paper_title.en: Does a gravitational wave propagate in the five-dimensional space-time with Kaluza-Klein monopole?

description.en: The behaviour of small perturbations around the Kaluza-Klein monopole in the five-dimensional space-time is investigated. The fact that the odd-parity gravitational wave does not propagate in the five-dimensional space-time with Kaluza-Klein monopole is found, provided that the gravitational wave is constant in the fifth direction. © 1995 Società Italiana di Fisica.

paper_title.en: Two dimensional Quantum Cromodynamics in Light Cone -- N amplitudes to one amplitude --
paper_title.ja: Two dimensional Quantum Cromodynamics in Light Cone -- N amplitudes to one amplitude --

publication_name.en: World Scientific Pub. Co. Pte Ltd., "Group Theoretical Method in Physics"
publication_name.ja: World Scientific Pub. Co. Pte Ltd., "Group Theoretical Method in Physics"

paper_title.en: Gravitational-wave propagation in the five-dimensional Kaluza-Klein space-time

description.en: The behaviours of small perturbation around the Kaluza-Klein metric in the five-dimensional space-time are investigated. The solutions to the coupled equations for the amplitude of the metric perturbation for the five-dimensional Kaluza-Klein space-time are obtained. Odd- and even-parity perturbations propagate in the five-dimensional Kaluza-Klein space-time provided that the perturbations are constants in the fifth direction. The small perturbations are identified with gravitational waves. © 1994 Società Italiana di Fisica.

paper_title.ja: 4a-8 北海道教育大学における免許更新講習への取り組み

description.ja: 『教員として必要な資質能力が保持されるよう、定期的に最新の知識技能を身に付けることで、教員が自信と誇りを持って教壇に立ち、社会の尊敬と信頼を得る』ことを目的として、平成21年4月から教員免許更新制が導入された。離島な多く抱える長崎県とともに、人口密度が低く広大な面積を有する北海道で、いかに免許更新講習を実施していくかが危惧されている。本発表では、北海道教育大学の免許更新講習への取り組みについて報告を行う。
